brief_description: Manages credit card authorization requests including real-time processing, fraud detection, and authorization management.
business_purpose: This function handles the critical business process of credit card authorization, processing real-time authorization requests, making approval or decline decisions based on account status and credit limits, and managing fraud detection and prevention. It ensures secure and efficient authorization processing while maintaining proper audit trails and fraud monitoring capabilities.
